name: toggle_hitbox
description: If `true`, allows this <%= type 'Tile' %> to be hit by <%= type 'Spell' %>s.
Otherwise, it cannot be affected by any <%= type 'Spell' %>s.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.desc: `true`, if this <%= doc_class_name %> should be able to be affected by <%= type 'Spell' %>s.

text: Toggling the hitbox **off** (`false`), also stops them from being included by certain functions.
